name: FLY2U
description:
The game tells about the adventures of an autumn leaf that has fallen into free fall and does not want to fall to the ground. He just wants to fly, and your task is to help fulfill his dream.

Controls:

Move Up - W / Up

Move Down - S / Down

Move Left - A / Left

Move Right - D / Right

Diagonal movement - W + D / Up + Right

                                               - S + D / Down + Right

                                               - W + A / Up + Left

                                               - S + A / Down + Left

Pause - P / Esc

Developers - Sergey Shumov & Alexander Petrov
